keyword: how many calories in a small sweet potato
title: How Many Calories in a Small Sweet Potato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a small sweet potato, including carbs, fiber, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Small Sweet Potato?
assumptions: Baked in skin, no added fats or toppings; approximately 100 g weight for a small size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A small baked sweet potato has about 90 kcal and 21 g of carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Boiled instead of baked (per small potato)

faqs.q: How many calories in a small sweet potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 90 kcal for a 100 g baked small sweet potato.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a small sweet potato?
faqs.a: About 21 g carbs, including 3.3 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are sweet potatoes low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1 g fat per small sweet potato, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in sweet potatoes?
faqs.a: Baking retains more nutrients; boiling may slightly reduce calories due to water absorption.

faqs.q: How much protein is in a small sweet potato?
faqs.a: Roughly 2 g protein, making it a modest source compared to carbs.
